channel.name: And Flix IN
channel.title: Vincent N Roxxy
channel.desc: An unlikely romance develops between Vincent, a loner, and Roxxy, a rebel, while they are on the run to save their lives. However, their violent past seems to catch up with them wherever they go.

channel.name: And Flix IN
channel.title: Lawless
channel.desc: Three siblings operate an illegal moonshine business using their restaurant as a front. Things take a turn when the oldest brother, Forrest, refuses to pay a bribe to a corrupt lawman.

channel.name: And Flix IN
channel.title: Extraction
channel.desc: When Leonard Turner, a former CIA operative, is held captive by a group of Russian arms dealers, his son, Harry Turner, sets out to find and rescue him.

channel.name: And Flix IN
channel.title: Hotel Transylvania: Transformania
channel.desc: When Van Helsing's invention goes awry, Johnny turns into a monster and Dracula becomes human. Later, they embark on a journey to find a cure before their transformations become permanent.

channel.name: And Flix IN
channel.title: Never Back Down 2: The Beatdown
channel.desc: Four fighters from different backgrounds come together to train under a former MMA star. Ultimately, they have to fight each other and also the traitor who hides among them.

channel.name: And Flix IN
channel.title: The Gunman
channel.desc: Terrier, an assassin, kills the minister of mining in Congo before going into hiding. Years later, he returns to Congo as a charity worker, unaware that he is the target of a hit squad.

channel.name: And Flix IN
channel.title: Underworld: Rise of the Lycans
channel.desc: Lucian, a werewolf slave, convinces his Lycan compatriots to rebel against their vampire masters, who are led by Viktor, a powerful vampire elder. This leads to a full-fledged war between the two.

channel.name: And Flix IN
channel.title: The Possession of Hannah Grace
channel.desc: Megan, a former police officer who works in a morgue, is tasked with moving a disfigured body. However, she sees terrifying visions that make her suspect that the corpse is possessed by a demon.

channel.name: And Flix IN
channel.title: Evolution
channel.desc: When a meteor crashes on Earth, it brings with it single-celled organisms which evolve rapidly. Later, four professionals stumble upon these aliens and must stop their growth to avoid an invasion.

channel.name: And Flix IN
channel.title: Please Stand By
channel.desc: Wendy, a young woman with autism, runs away from her caregiver and embarks on a journey of a lifetime in order to submit her manuscript to a screenwriting competition.

channel.name: And Flix IN
channel.title: Dance With Me
channel.desc: Dance fans show their skills and viewers learn cool moves from famous dancers, mixing talent display with fun lessons for all.

channel.desc: Dance fans show their skills and viewers learn cool moves from famous dancers, mixing talent display with fun lessons for all.

channel.title: Universal Soldier 4
channel.desc: After waking up from a coma, John vows to kill the man responsible for the death of his wife and daughter. However, his vengeance leads him to encounter a terrifying army of reanimated supersoldiers.

channel.name: And Flix IN
channel.title: Drone
channel.desc: An unexpected confrontation brings a drone operator's hidden life into sharp focus, setting off a tense moral standoff with devastating emotional stakes.

channel.name: And Flix IN
channel.title: Hotel Mumbai
channel.desc: A hotel staff risks everything to keep its patrons safe during a terror attack, especially a British heiress, her husband and her infant.

channel.name: And Flix IN
channel.title: Siberia
channel.desc: As Lucas Hill travels to Russia to sell rare blue diamonds, his colleague goes missing with the items. Subsequently, he sets out to look for the priceless stones but ends up tangled in a love affair.

channel.name: And Flix IN
channel.title: Beast of Burden
channel.desc: Sean has one hour to deliver illegal cargo from his small plane. Meanwhile, he keeps dangerous people happy and saves his wife, all while flying and running out of time.

channel.name: And Flix IN
channel.title: Grown Ups
channel.desc: Five childhood friends take their families for a weekend trip to a lake house in their hometown, where they reunite to attend the funeral of their former high school basketball coach.

channel.name: And Flix IN
channel.title: Renegades
channel.desc: Four colleagues of a former Green Beret soldier decide to avenge his death by giving up their own form of justice on the lanes of London.

channel.name: And Flix IN
channel.title: The Nice Guys
channel.desc: Amelia, a girl in hiding, hires Healy to put March, a detective seeking her, in his place. After two hitmen try to get Healy to reveal her whereabouts, he concernedly pairs with March to find her.

channel.name: And Flix IN
channel.desc: Micky, a maths professor, enlists five gifted students to use their abilities to win millions at blackjack in Las Vegas. He exploits their talents for personal gain in the glamorous casino city.

channel.name: And Flix IN
channel.title: New Police Story
channel.desc: A guilt-ridden police officer finds solace in liquor after he loses his squad during a mission. Soon, his new partner convinces him to reopen the case while harbouring a secret agenda of his own.

channel.name: And Flix IN
channel.title: Our Kind of Traitor
channel.desc: Perry and his wife go on a holiday to save their marriage and come across Dima, a man who is involved with the mafia. They soon find themselves caught in the middle of a crisis.
